授業方法:
The course will be conducted on-line with Zoom, simultaneously and interactively.The course will discuss the principles, theories and practices of marketing with a particular emphasis on brands and corporate communication.
Research meetings via zoom will be held on an individual basis.
Discussions will focus on: TBA

トピック.授業計画1:
The course will discuss the principles, theories and practices of marketing with a particular emphasis on brand marketing and corporate communication.
Research meetings via zoom will be held on an individual basis.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are responsible to obtain relevant literature to their research and should contact instructor if there is a need to access certain research material. Students are expected to study the assigned materials carefully and use additional materials beyond the assigned readings to expand their understanding and contribute in discussions.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Course evaluation will be based on completing all the assigned readings, summaries of articles and research activities that lead to the completion of a paper on a topic determined during the course.

name: 【700】先端マネジメント特殊研究（マーケティング）　４／Special Research in Marketing
